
1. Models 

```{r }
# pull out a specific buffer size 
squirrel_500 <- squirrel[squirrel$buff_dist == 500, ] 
```

```{r}

# conifer
conifer <- glmmTMB::glmmTMB(cbind(red_squirrel, absent_red_squirrel) ~ 
                     scale(lc_coniferous) +
                     (1|array), 
                     data = squirrel_500, 
                     family = "binomial")

summary(conifer)
                     
```
